meanings.sent1: The cobaltic mineral had a shiny blue color.
meanings.sent2: Her necklace was made of cobaltic metal.
meanings.sent3: The cobaltic paint on the walls made the room look brighter.
meanings.sent4: The cobaltic sky reflected in the calm lake.
meanings.sent5: The cobaltic hue of the flower stood out in the garden.

meanings.sent1: The cobaltic glass vase sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The cobaltic solution turned the liquid blue.
meanings.sent3: The cobaltic ink in the pen made the writing stand out.
meanings.sent4: The cobaltic eyes of the cat gleamed in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The cobaltic streaks in the rock indicated the presence of cobalt.

meanings.definition: A compound containing cobalt in its highest oxidation state.
meanings.sent1: The scientist synthesized a cobaltic for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The cobaltic reacted with the other chemicals in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The cobaltic in the test tube bubbled and fizzed.
meanings.sent4: The cobaltic in the battery powered the device efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The cobaltic used in the industry was in high demand.
